title: Linking Stochastic Self-Propagating Star Formation and Spatio-Temporal Point Processes
summary: This work establishes a connection between the stochastic self-propagating star-formation (SSPSF) model and spatio-temporal point processes (STPP), providing a formal statistical foundation for the SSPSF model.
usefulness_reason: The title and abstract directly and explicitly mention "Spatio-Temporal Point Processes" multiple times, which is the core of the search query. This paper is directly and substantially about the topic.
